data.event: The village is significant for the 1686 Grade I listed Belton House.

event.title: May 1643 Parliamentary cavalry, under the leadership of Oliver Cromwell, clashed

data.event: In May 1643 Parliamentary cavalry, under the leadership of Oliver Cromwell, clashed with Royalist forces at the south of Belton Park, to the east of Manthorpe.
The Belton church register records "May 1643, buried three unknown soldiers, slain in Belton fight".
